full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

Great, thank you.

Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Albiez

­­­

Hi Andrea,

We are looking into this. Regarding templates we will update you shortly.

Regarding the 9% premium, there is a price increase of 9% above 4500 and 2% below 4500. This will be 0% for proposals created today onwards. Previous quote will still have 9% and 2%.

Hi Joel,

Sorry, just found a couple of glitches…


  1. The templates are not updated - could you please update them?

  2. It looks like the 9% premium is still on - can you please take it off?



Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Albiez

Hi Andrea,

Confirming we have updated the Show room totals in quote. We have updated the Balcony Rooms as well.

Regarding Delivery/Collection/Styling prices are now live as well. This will be applied for proposals created today onwards.

Thanks Joel,

Now that we don't have a hidden premium, can you please activate the toggle "Show room totals in quote" so it's an option we can turn on and off?

I found more predefined room/s, Balcony (2, 4, 6 & 8 chairs), with an issue… the Outdoor Chairs do not have a price. Can you please change all pre-defined Balcony Rooms to 'Outdoor Dining Chair/s' and hide 'Outdoor Chair/s'.

I'll ask one of the sales support team to check all predefined rooms now to make sure they're all correct, then let you know if we need any further updates.

The delivery/collection/styling prices are not live yet and the team are sending quotes out. Can you please activate that now?



Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Albiez

GENERAL MANAGER

0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

http://novaricollective.com.au/



­­­

Hi Andrea,

Confirming we have updated the pricing, please check now.

Regarding the price increase is set to 0% it will only affect proposal created today onwards. Proposal created 2021-04-26 to 2024-05-26 will still have 4% increase.
Predefined prices are now updated as well and excluded the items.
Dining table on "Dining" predefined room was altered to be "Table 6 Seater". You update the room inventories here. https://syd-proposal.novaricollective.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=room

Hi Joel, I just did a test quote and the tiered pricing for delivery/collection/styling services looks good, thank you. However, the pricing hasn't been updated on the test site - is that right? .
  • Every line item should have the price shown on the 'Quote Platform Updates'. Please remove any hidden premium.
  • The sales team should not be able to select any item noted as 'HIDE'.
  • I tested 'Populate Room' for the dining room, and still populates with 'Dining Table' at $28 (it is only hidden/greyed out if trying to select as a single item). Can you please change the 'Populate Room' option to 'Table (6 seater)' as the default option.
  • Please make sure all 'Populate Room' options, populate at the new prices.
  • Anything I didn't have on the price list can remain the same.
See comments in green below. Kind regards, Andrea Andrea Albiez GENERAL MANAGER 0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com 02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019 http://novaricollective.com.au/ ­­­

Hi Andrea,

Confirming we have updated the site. Please see below:

Inventory Prices are now updated to the live site.
  • Inventory Items that are on the excel list was updated (For EX "2.5 or 3 Seat Sofa" was hidden)
  • Inventory items that are NOT on the excel list was left unchanged (For Ex "Bar Fridge" nothing was change)
  • Please note that there is a 4% hidden increase to the inventory. (For Ex "Accessories (Study) $19" it will be 19 * 1.04 = 19.76 then round off so $20)

Delivery Prices, we have setup a staging site for you to check, you can use the same login. https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/wp-login.php
  • Please note that we have set the date May 24 onwards to have that new version of transport prices (The date will be adjusted when we push this to live)

Hi Joel, I understand I need to approve before going live.
  • Is the delivery pricing be locked in and cannot be overridden? If the delivery price can be overriden, Do you need individual fields for (Delivery, pickup, styling services)?
    • Delivery pricing to be locked and cannot be overridden
    • Yes, individual fields so it appears as per my example
  • Once it is live, will it only affect the new created proposal?
    • Yes, only new proposals
Kind regards, Andrea Andrea Albiez GENERAL MANAGER 0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com 02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019 http://novaricollective.com.au/ ­­­

Hi Andrea,

We are looking into this,

We can finish update the pricing over the weekend.

Regarding the split delivery prices, we can give this to you on Monday for checking (staging link) and need your approval before going live.

Also can you confirm the split delivery prices below:
  • Is the delivery pricing be locked in and cannot be overridden? If the delivery price can be overriden, Do you need individual fields for (Delivery, pickup, styling services)?
  • Once it is live, will it only affect the new created proposal?

Hi Heath and Joel, I've attached new pricing for our quoting platform, including how we'd like the delivery, collection and styling fees to be charged in tiers depending on the value of the quote. I've also attached an example of the proposal - you can see on page 3 under 'QUOTE'. There are 2 tabs;
  • Delivery and Installation Charge
  • Furnishing Charge
Is it possible to have this updated to take effect over this weekend? I.e. quotes up until COB tomorrow are at the current price, and when we start on Monday morning, they'll be updated to reflect the changes. I have no idea whether that's enough notice for you, so please let me know if it's not possible. I ask because we have a promotion going out on Monday and I'd like the new pricing ready for that. I haven't been able to find the time to update 'Terms and Conditions', or 'Important Information about your Installation'. I'll now do it separately and send that to you later next week. Kind regards, Andrea Andrea Albiez GENERAL MANAGER 0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com 02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019 http://novaricollective.com.au/ ­­­

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the clarification. Yes, understand it's billable.

Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Albiez

GENERAL MANAGER

­­­

Hi Andrea,

Just for clarity, this will be billable work, as per Joel's estimated time required. The total will be around 16hrs. Please confirm if you are ok for us to proceed when you send through the updated proposal example.

Hi,

I apologise for the delay getting back to you. I'll work on getting you a full proposal example of what I'd like the PDF to look like because I also want to update the 'Important Information About Your Installation' section. I'd like the quote section to look like the image below.

Please see other responses in blue in the email trail below.



I'll be in touch with the proposal example asap.

Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Albiez

GENERAL MANAGER

0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com

http://novaricollective.com.au/



­­­

Hi Andrea,

We are looking deeper into this. Can you please confirm the below?

Update pricing for 82 products (we will provide a spreadsheet) (.5 hrs)
  • Sure, this can be done

Void 42 products (or 'switch off' so they can't be selected) (1.5-3 hrs)
  • Sure, this can be done. What happens when the product (void product) was set on a previously created proposal?

Split delivery Price (8-16 hrs)
  • Is the delivery pricing be locked in and cannot be override? if No, Do you need individual fields for (Delivery, pickup, styling services)?
  • The do we need to show the breakdown of the items on pay quote page and the documentation? each line (this will be update to WORD DOC, PDF, Payquote page and create prop, checkout/email fields).
  • Once it is live, will it only affect the new created proposal or it will be applied to all proposal?

We will take a fresh copy of the live environment and will work on staging first for you to test. Let us know if this works for you?
